channel.title: Laptop internet issues
channel.description: The problem : Router is constantly declining my laptop's connection (No idea why,) Viruses are ruled out, my laptop has been scanned multiple times with three different AV's and they say it's CLEAN. It's happening not much but SOMETIMES it happens every 45 seconds and it's fking annoying. Diagnostics is claiming my router is fked, but I know for a fact that my modem is fine. it's been reset and it doesn't change much. So, what is the actual problem? does my laptop need a restart every 12 hours? it's not on like all the time, it gets turned off and put in standby a lot, but it makes no difference. Help please.

item.title: Laptop internet issues
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Some ISP’s will “reset/change” the IP every so often(normally every 10 hours or so ) so that could be the problem. If it isn’t automatically trying to repick up a wireless signal from the router connected to the modem there is a chance your wireless card could not be functioning properly either.
